name: Dino Run (Spartan Game Labs)
description:
This is a multiplayer racing game where two players run on identical course in an attempt to beat the other in a race.The players can interact with each other by using the eggs that they collect. These eggs have hidden powers that could mess up the other players run. The course has a variety of parkour challenges for each dinosaur and optionality in which route one takes.

P1 Controls:

Left A

Right D

Jump W

Item S

P2 Controls:

Left L

Right '

Jump P

Item ;
